name: TooltipPopup
description:
A container for the tooltip contents.
Renders a `<div>` element.

className.description:
CSS class applied to the element, or a function that
returns a class based on the component’s state.

render.description:
Allows you to replace the component’s HTML element
with a different tag, or compose it with another component.

Accepts a `ReactElement` or a function that returns the element to render.

data-open.description: Present when the tooltip is open.

data-closed.description: Present when the tooltip is closed.

data-instant.description: Indicates the instant type of the tooltip popup.

data-side.description: Indicates which side the tooltip is positioned relative to the trigger.

data-starting-style.description: Present when the tooltip is animating in.

data-ending-style.description: Present when the tooltip is animating out.
